content: This is the chat space for the September 2021 Patient Request for Corrections connectathon

Stayed tuned for more information! In the meantime, please join us in our preparations! We meet every Tuesday at 1Pm US Eastern Time: http://www.hl7.org/concalls/CallDetails.cfm?concall=55114
You can also reach out to me of @Debi Willis
Join us on Whova next Tuesday September 7th at 1PM Eastern for our Track Orientation and IG Overview!

If anyone wants to test with the WildFHIR R4 reference server - since HAPI seems to not be available and the WildFHIR folk say they can support search on Communication.about,

I have created 6 test patients with associated encounters and practitioners:
Bob Correction1
Bob Correction2
Bob Correction3
Bob Correction4
Bob Correction5
Bob Correction6

Claim one and post here.

The endpoint is: http://wildfhir4.aegis.net/fhir4-0-1/
Test from Lisa Nelson - just confirming I am in the right place.
@Lisa Nelson - can you get Jake to ping me when he's ready to test again? (by all means try it out though !)

Attached is the Bundle in the POST body to clinFHIR to indicate a Patient correction request. It includes the Patient, DocumentReference, Binary representing an annotated CCD, and the Communication

clinFhirInitialBundle.json
